name: The Sims: Livin' Large
description:
The Sims: Livin' Large is a strategy game developed by Maxis. It was originally released in 2000. Electronic Arts published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, The Sims: Livin' Large has a score of 82. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
The Sims: Livin' Large is available on PC.
